[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563d72b63687247c9590c00#post_5563d72b63687247c9590c00
I'd heard about that. Care to fill me in?[/bq]
Tl:dr;
Love Live is a popular anime/video game franchise -> It's coming over to the usa -> It got censored in the usa cause the company doesn't want gays in video games -> this shitstorm is attracting homophobes and xenophobes like flies to a turd.


Pro-original content side:
"It's not your job to censor games due to your political ideology"
Pro-censored translation side:
"Keep gays out of gaming"

topics.body:
Okay...Japanese captain america.

A man named Steve rogers enters a government project involving a special suit of armor. A spy from a terrorist group known as Hydra ends up sabotaging things. Leaving Steve rogers as the only man who can use the technology for the time being. When he finds out that Hydra is stationed in Japan, He heads there to confront them and dubs himself Captain america.

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563d82163687247c96b0e00#post_5563d82163687247c96b0e00
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563d84b636872195c070b00#post_5563d84b636872195c070b00
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563d85763687247c9df0e00#post_5563d85763687247c9df0e00
!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/886/911/271.jpg!

So I looked further into it; apparently this isn't just a isolated case when it comes to japanese games and that.  Apparently there's a long term problem with localization companies cutting out homosexuals from japanese games and that.  There's even a article on this shit on wikipedia.

So "sub > dub master race" you've finally convinced me; subbed really is better than dubbed.

Funnily enough KLab America is in San Francisco of all places.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563da9163687249e90b0b00#post_5563da9163687249e90b0b00
Step 1. Watch any video that has THGTHG explaining something.
Step 2. Read the text below with that voice.

About 2 years ago, similar to that of 8 pony years in Equestria at the planet Terra with the North Sector of the North Sector of the East Sector of the North Sector of the Galaxy, a young and more or less ambitious man who goes by his DJ name, cb5 decided that he wanted to express his feelings of love and philosophy and all the other things that nobody cares of to the web. So, he did just that. Except he didn't.

There was paperwork to be filled and investments to be made before the thread could even begun to exist. It didn't take long since the MODs (Machine-like Overlords of Derpibooru) didn't really care much as long as the residents and occasional slaves follow the guidelines they have placed. Guidelines that very little read. Which is why this book exists.

*[thinking more]*

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563ddc36368725795900400#post_5563ddc36368725795900400
I'm going to bed in about 30 minutes cause I was wondering how bad the censorship is.. just fuck morality police with a medieval mace.  There's pages upon pages upon pages of localization censoring glbt in mass media from japan.

I never quite understood why japan makes fun of the usa so much, but it's crystal clear now.

Morality police in the usa, "I don't like how poorly japan depicts gays so I'm going to censor gays in localizations in the name of promoting gay rights"

The more I read about it the angrier and angrier I get.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563e0706368720a150d0600#post_5563e0706368720a150d0600
Censorship as an idea needs to be killed. It's an idea that preys on other ideas. Killing it will save all the other ideas.

I'm all in favor of ending "moral" policing for good.
